name: go-clonr
description: This project is aimed to make creating template projects very easy, so that you can set up a project one time, and not worry about configuration again.  Simply host your template project in a git repostory, configure your template variables in a .clonrrc file, as well as providing a placeholder in the  template files, and run `clonr clone <repo_url>`. The rest will unfold before your eyes.
author: oledakotajoe
